#summary The tabindex attribute specifies the order of elements for sequential focus navigation.

Despite what the [SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] specification says, [BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] and [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] [http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Key-navigable_custom_DHTML_widgets recognize the tabindex attribute on any element].
